storyInfo: The ceremony is close at hand, and the Viscount's troops have already arrived by the lakeside. Enciodes's defenses have yet to come into play, and in Kjerag's most dire hour of need, Degenbrecher faces down an army alone.

attributes.content: They say that Lake Silberneherze is most beautiful during winter.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Winter seals the lake in a case of ice, and from afar it looks for all the world like a great gemstone, revealing a most breathtaking beauty in the brilliant sunlight.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But if you were to observe from up close, perhaps you would be able to appreciate its beauty even further.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There is no gem so flawless, yet so adamant; beneath the ice, its waters yet flow.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Since when did you decide to take up poetry?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: According to the directives of the Vine-Bear Court, we will follow behind the Saintess, walking from the ice to below the feet of the statue of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is hardly what I would call a short stroll, and all sorts of mishaps can befall us while we walk.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis, are you worried that the ice beneath your feet might shatter?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: How very unlike you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You know that's not what I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Many of the guests of ours who are here to 'attend' will be watching us with keen eyes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Your plans for defensive maneuvers still lack accurate information, Enciodes. We are not in what I would call a favorable position.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Allowing that Trilby Asher to approach the statue of Kjeragandr yesterday was my mistake.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If we have need of it, I can go and settle things with him right now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If our quarry has already sensed aught amiss, then acting now would already be too late.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This terrible habit of yours of neglecting the bigger picture when you take action... Forget it, you and Enciodes are pretty much the same. I'm not asking either of you to change your ways.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: All I ask is that next time, please go to the trouble of restraining yourselves, just for a little bit. You'll save me from having to wrack my brain to find ways to clean up your messes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Duly noted, Gnosis. What do you think, Enciodes?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I have not the strength to casually cut apart a giant statue tens of meters high.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You merely invited that Doctor over, who then proceeded to nearly ruin our plans is all.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: ...*sigh*
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I have no desire to listen to the two of you jibe and snipe at each other with your nonsense.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Now, about the Tschäggättä responsible for keeping order...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They will be posted to the island ahead of time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: As for who is in charge of the reception for the Victorians, there are several merchants who will take care of the matter.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Gnosis, you are far too tense.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We have already completed all the preparations we can do. All we can do now is wait.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And wait we shall.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Spring is just around the corner.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I still remember when the Saintess descended from atop Mount Karlan three years ago.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: That day, Kjeragandr sent us Her blessings, and even that Enciodes couldn't help but kneel... I do not know if we will ever see such miracles again these days.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Seems like seeing the sights of today has hooked up your old memories, my friend.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: But Arctosz, don't you think you've been wallowing in those memories too often these past few years?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Rather than putting your efforts into sarcasm, Ratatos, you should care more about today's ceremony.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I've felt that something was off ever since I woke up this morning... Don't you think Kjeragandr's statue looks a little bit different compared to yesterday?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You Browntails were in charge of managing construction, so you'd better think up a real good explanation for the Saintess!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Heh, no need to worry about that...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Hey, Arctosz, why's your face look like that?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Did that Trilby Asher rough you up or something?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Well, it's like you said! No need to worry about that!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: (The girl's real feisty, just like Tatyana. Just like me.)
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: (Not bad.)
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Patriarch, Matriarch, everyone is present.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Good. Let the people below know that they can head to their designated positions and wait for now.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: The Saintess will arrive soon. If anyone dares to tarnish the Browntail name at this critical moment, I won't be showing any mercy!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Understood, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Wait a moment, Yucatan.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Why's it just you? Where's your wife?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: It's almost time already, why's she not here?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Rus told me this morning that she had a few things to do...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: She wants to prepare a pleasant surprise for you, Matriarch.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: I'm not sure if I should look forward to a pleasant surprise from her.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What could possibly be more important than today's ceremony? Can't she pick a better time to give me a headache?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I... I'll send her a message right away.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Don't worry, Matriarch. Rus is very clear on what she should be prioritizing.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: I should have figured that you'd be on your wife's side.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Alright, alright. She's no longer a girl. Guess I'll just have to wait and see what this 'pleasant surprise' of hers is.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Anyway, if she's off doing things, why didn't she bring you along?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Rus already has someone helping her out...
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Everyone, the time has come.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Saintess arrives.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Please, lend me your ears.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It has been three years since the Vine-Bear Court has recognized those foreigners who wish to devote themselves to Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjerag today is capable of incredible growth and development, but that growth rests on the shoulders of the good folk here today, alongside the toil and devotion of all Kjerag's people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I believe that you all have seen the change that has come to Kjerag these past few years with your own eyes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr has given Her people, Her children, a challenge, and we have already given Her our answer.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yet these past three years are merely the beginning.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In the coming days, we will meet with more complex situations than ever before, and Kjerag will see its fair share of trials and tribulations.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, I hope that we all believe that Kjeragandr will not abandon this land of Kjerag, and neither will She abandon the lives of those who live upon it, for She so loves Her people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This great statue of Kjeragandr will be the main symbol of Kjerag to the outside world.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: At the same time, it will become a vessel for all the love that Her faithful show to Her.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hereafter, one need not climb Mount Karlan to make one's devotions to Her. You need but face towards Her during your prayers.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It is my wish that the faith you have in Her is not constrained by the trappings of ceremony.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I believe that true faith has taken root in the hearts of all of Kjerag's people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Now, I ask of you to walk with me, walk with me under the gaze of Kjeragandr towards the foot of Her holy statue, where we will pray for Her to bestow Her blessings upon Kjerag!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The many voices by the lake that cry out Kjeragandr's name blend and merge together.
The Saintess stands at the head of the crowd, and takes the first step onto the ice.
The frozen Lake Silberneherze shines like a flawless gem when looked upon from afar.
But only once you stand atop it will you see that this 'gem' is covered in chips and cracks.

The ice is covered in cracks wending and weaving across the surface, the endlessly churning waters beneath the ice surging about together. Under the dawn light, it is as if the soul of the lake itself was wandering about in an eternal cycle.
In the eyes of the people of Kjerag, such a sight was so beautiful as to be breathtaking.

Kjeragandr's Saintess steps across the cracks that seemed like they were carved by the biting winds, as if walking past a millennium's worth of Kjerag's bitterly cold hardships, as if walking past its endless winter days.
Because now, spring was just around the corner.
How the hell are they not here yet?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Are you kidding me?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The communicator doesn't work. Didn't they say they'd be getting to Kjerag last night, so they'd definitely catch the train today?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Huff... hah...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Calm down, Sciurus... Calm down.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Okay... I've calmed down. The Saintess needs to walk across the ice to the island, so the ceremony won't be starting quite so soon. I've still got time.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Think about the look on Ratatos's face when this is all over...)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Aha, hahaha!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Ahem.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (I've definitely got the time right, and punctuality is par for the course on that side.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (A little lateness is one thing. We won't be too late now, I'm sure.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (I think the train to Lake Silberneherze should be pulling into the station right around now.)
attributes.name: Sciurus
Sciurus
attributes.content: Alright, let me see, the next train is arriving at...

attributes.name: Sciurus
attributes.content: Why's it so late?!
Madam Sciurus, that train is a local that stops at every station. It's natural that it's somewhat delayed...
attributes.name: Station Steward

attributes.content: I don't care if it's natural, I need that train here right now!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Damn it all, I can't just sit here and wait!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Get me in touch with the station master! I want that train sped up right away!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If it doesn't need to stop, then it better not stop! Make sure it's going at full speed too!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But, Madam!
attributes.name: Station Steward

attributes.content: If we do that, it would greatly inconvenience the passengers aboard the train!
attributes.name: Station Steward

attributes.content: As long as they end up where they wanted to go, it should be fine, right?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Eh? Ah, well, yes, but...
attributes.name: Station Steward

attributes.content: No buts!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch! MONCH!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Here, Madam.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Get in touch with the manager of 'BangBang Burdenbeast' for me! Get them to round up every single one of their free burdenbeasts right now!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Anyone waiting to get on the train at the stations that it passes, get them a burdenbeast to take them wherever they want!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Yes, Madam.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Madam Sciurus, is... is this really alright?
attributes.name: Station Steward

attributes.content: You got a problem with it?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Right, thanks for reminding me.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: We'll need to prepare a small gift for everyone already aboard the train. We'll call it a token of apology for disrupting their journey. Use the souvenirs that you sell on the trains for that!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: All expenses can go to Clan Browntail... No, wait, put it all on my personal account!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Understood. It shall be done.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I hope that's enough... No, it's definitely enough!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: For sure...!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Faster!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Don't forget what we're here to do! In the back, keep pace!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Halt! Gather up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Form up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Sir! Reporting in! Second Squad in formation, sir!
attributes.name: Stern Soldier

attributes.content: Very good then.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: And Third Squad?
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Sir! Reporting in! Third Squad in formation, sir!
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Jack, have your squad bring up the rear!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: I want constant vigilance! Don't overlook a single enemy!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Slippery Soldier

attributes.content: Good, keep those spirits up!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: All squads, forward march!
attributes.name: Lead Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldiers

attributes.content: What are those Victorians up to now? Are they holding... weapons?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: Surely not? Aren't they here to attend the ceremony or something?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Have you ever seen them line up in formation like that before? It... It must be all just for show...
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: I've gotta say, I don't think they've got the same look to them as they did before.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Kjeragandr protect us from harm...
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Reporting in, sir!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: We've finished scouting ahead. The Saintess has already started leading everyone over to the island!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Are our men all prepared?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: All troops in formation! Ready to commence operations at any time!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Good. Keep them lined up, and await my orders.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lake Silberneherze on a winter's day. Truly one of Kjerag's most beautiful sights.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Who would have thought that the next time I clapped eyes on this wonder would be under circumstances like this?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You've become much gloomier these days, Harold.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Have I? Haha, you know as they say, 'soft days make soft men'.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lisburn, after a whole month of R&R, you're still able to swing your sword around?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: It's much heavier than I remember.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: How about you, Charles?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: It's a battlefield. We're Victorian soldiers.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Not much else I can do.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: You're right. In the decades since I joined the army, never have I met finer soldiers than you all.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Am I right, Charles?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I think I'm gonna puke.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: But what else can I do?
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Give the order already, Harold.
attributes.name: Somber Soldier

attributes.content: Forgive me, my friends.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, orders incoming!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Everyone, forward march!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Under the guise of building a statue of their goddess, the Kjerags have been secretly transporting military goods under our noses. We will let them know the price of trying to make a fool of Victoria!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Mission objective: destroy the statue of Kjeragandr atop the island!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldiers

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: The train won't be making further stops? Are you certain of this?
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Okay. Understood.
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Skeptical Passenger

attributes.content: Why didn't we stop at that station just now?
attributes.name: Skeptical Passenger

attributes.content: I am truly, incredibly sorry!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen! Our train has run into a small operational issue!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Until we arrive at the station at Lake Silberneherze, the train will be increasing in speed, and will not be stopping at intervening stations...
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Not stopping? This is unacceptable! I'm meant to get off for sightseeing at the next station!
attributes.name: Astonished Passenger

attributes.content: Me too!
attributes.name: Unhappy Passenger

attributes.content: I was going to go and visit the local markets too... Whyever can't you stop the train anyway?!
attributes.name: Unhappy Passenger

attributes.content: We offer our deepest apologies for this inconvenience to everyone!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: As compensation, we have prepared for all our passengers a gift as a token of our apology!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: All passengers may freely pick a souvenir of your choice from our store aboard this train! Whether it's specialty cheeses or a burdenbeast blind box, it's all FREE OF CHARGE!!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Oh... Well, if there's compensation, I suppose that's alright.
attributes.name: Astonished Passenger

attributes.content: Ah, that's right! I ask all passengers to note that there is a limited amount of gift-wrapped mountain ice water, so if you would like some, please come as soon as possible—
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Alright, alright! No need to go on any more than that!
attributes.name: Skeptical Passenger

attributes.content: Okay, sure, speed up the train, no stopping at the stations, whatever! Just gimme one of those super-expensive limited-edition waters already!
attributes.name: Skeptical Passenger

attributes.content: Hey, no cutting in line!
attributes.name: Unhappy Passenger

attributes.content: Give me a water too!
attributes.name: Unhappy Passenger

attributes.content: Things sure are lively today.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What could possibly be so urgent as to rush this train to Lake Silberneherze? Is it to deliver some mystery goods, or perhaps people...?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Either way...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I believe I win this hand.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The trains here have all been handled, Madam.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: As per your orders, the premier train next arriving at Lake Silberneherze is now running at top speed.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: But are you sure that the guests you invited are aboard that train?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Of course I'm sure!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's just that, if we happened to be wrong...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: No way! They're definitely on that train!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch, I must ask, do you know how many new relay stations we've built to ensure a smooth signal across all of Kjerag these past three years?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I... I'm afraid I'm not quite sure.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Well, you've just returned to Kjerag, so I suppose it's natural for you not to know. So listen up and remember this!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: In Browntail territory alone, we've built five of those top-of-the-line relay stations to ensure that the signal never breaks!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That many...?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Yep!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: We also called in some professionals courtesy of that Doctor from Rhodes Island to help out, just to make sure that even amongst our many mountains, our communications will never be blocked!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: So what I'm trying to say is that, theoretically, as long as it's within Kjerag's borders, there shouldn't be any sort of communications mishap.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Aside from some... special places.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Special places...?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Hehe, can't figure it out? They're—
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Could it possibly be the private rooms on the train, Madam?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (Oh no, I shouldn't have said that...)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Heh... Bullseye!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's the private rooms on the train! More specifically, the private rooms on the premier train from the foot of Mount Karlan to Lake Silberneherze!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That train was a special order from Victoria. As for the other trains that we have, they used that train as a prototype to copy- I mean, to study how to manufacture our own.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The walls of the private rooms of that original train are inlaid with materials designed to isolate the occupants from disturbances from outside, so naturally, they will cut off communication signals too.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The other trains don't have this feature, because, er, because it would have drastically inflated construction costs...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I get it now!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: So what you're saying is, in determining if our guests are in Kjerag already, the very fact that your communicator can't reach them tells us that they must be in that specific train's private rooms!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: That's amazing, Madam! I'm learning so much about the trains as well!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Anyways!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Kjerag as it is now and Kjerag as of a few years ago couldn't be more different.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'm not going to ask where you've been these past few years, Monch, and I don't intend to pry into what you've been up to then. I don't even really care about why you didn't go back to that Gnosis either.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But if you really want to be my assistant, then you'd better get used to the modern-day Kjerag already!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: And you'd better not think that I'm still the same old Rus from three years ago, you hear me?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Yes, Madam!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I'll do my best!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Glad to hear it!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Eh? Why's there so many people outside?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hey, wait, aren't they...?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Get back! I said get back!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: All of you, not a step closer!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You... What the hell do you think you're doing?!
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: How dare you try and pull this stunt under Kjeragandr's gaze! Don't even think about trying to ruin today's ceremony!
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: Jack?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: That's you, isn't it, Jack? What are you playing at?!
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: You... You've just had a bit too much to drink, right?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: A word of advice from me, today's not the time to make a ruckus! Go tell the others quick, Jack—
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: I am under orders to shoot dead the next person who steps forward!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Woman

attributes.content: You know, back when you first showed up, people said that a bunch of foreign soldiers showing up in Kjerag couldn't be up to any good.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: I didn't believe them. I even spoke up for you guys.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: It seems that I was blind this entire time. So, this was your real purpose? To ruin our ceremony for Kjeragandr? To strike us down?
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: Kjeragandr will not forgive you for this.
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: You invite Her wrath upon yourselves!
attributes.name: Common Kjerag Man

attributes.content: Hah. Let Her try.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We were punished enough as it is, a long time ago.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Those are Victorian soldiers. Something's not right. They have their uniforms on, and they've got their weapons out too!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: It looks like there's been some sort of commotion outside!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Please, hide yourself, Madam...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: The black-haired girl is about to subconsciously hold out her arm to protect her employer.
But before the words can even leave her mouth, Sciurus proves to be a step ahead of her, covering her mouth with her own hand and pulling her into a corner.
(Shh!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Don't say a word, Monch. We need to stay hidden!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Those Victorians... Didn't they say they were just here to attend the ceremony? Hmph. I guess they've finally shown their true colors.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (This operation of theirs seems pretty big.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (That bitch Ratatos wouldn't know about this trouble yet, would she?)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Madam, they have a whole squad of Tschäggättä stationed there, alongside Degenbrecher from Karlan Trade. If trouble reaches them, it probably won't last very long.)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (Yeah... You're probably right.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (And with Yucatan there, my sister will be safe.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Madam, allow me to escort you somewhere safe. I'll go assist Sir Yucatan next.)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (No. I have to stay here to watch them. If things get even more heated here, at least I can stop them for a bit.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Look, don't worry, nothing's going to happen to me. Even if I did get found, considering that I'm an envoy between Kjerag and Victoria for multiple cooperative business ventures, I doubt they'll have the stones to mess with me.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Madam...)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (Don't look at me like that! I already told you, I'm not the same as I was three years ago!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Okay, listen up, Monch. I've got something I need you to do.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Yes, Madam! You need only say the word!)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (That Enciodes definitely has some sort of contingency plan up his sleeve for those Victorians. Considering how big this commotion's grown, I can only suspect that something's gone wrong with the deployment of his men.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Monch, I need you to investigate things for me. Go check up on what's happening over there, and if you get the chance, making the Silverashes owe the Browntails a favor would be pretty nice.)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Understood. I'll get it done.)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (What? Something on my face?)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Madam...)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (You really have grown.)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (Wh-Who asked you?!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (You're a lot younger than me, you know! Stop acting like you're the big sister! Really, you should be treating me like the big sister!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Can I really call you sister?)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: (*cough* *cough* We... We'll discuss this later!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Alright, get moving already!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Yes, Madam!)
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: From time to time, Degenbrecher thinks back to ten years ago.
Back then, every winter she would accompany Enciodes all across Kjerag.
That young man who had just returned to his home country was not yet the deeply experienced person he was now, still quite underripe. He had to do many things himself, rushing about to and fro.
One could say that he was hot-blooded, or one could say that he had ambition.
Degenbrecher remembered that in the winter of that year, Enciodes brought all his plans and stratagems that he had devised in Victoria back to Kjerag, where he single-handedly founded Karlan Trade.
Of the few people who could be called his confidants, she would have just barely been within their number.
And thus, she found herself staying in this cold, snowy land.
If you were to ask her, while she has long gotten used to the bitter chill, she does not actually like cold weather very much.
Kazimierz's winters were cold indeed.
Those days, she would make her way through many matches of the Majors in winter. This made the KGCC very unhappy, but whether or not her opponent was happy was never in her mind.
Going back even further, Leithanien's winters too, were cold.
Was Kjerag's winter not colder than Kazimierz's or Leithanien's?
Degenbrecher stamped her foot upon the ice's surface, frost crystals breaking loose under her step.
Thinking back to old times?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I remember that year when we had just arrived back in Kjerag from Victoria, we had crossed Lake Silberneherze as well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But back then, it was because all the roads had been snowed out.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: With no railroads or mechanized shovels or vehicles specially designed to handle snow, we were barely able to maintain a handful of flat main streets.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Under such heavy snowfalls, and with Karlan Trade only barely having started up, goods piled up behind snowbanks blocking the road, and the trade routes stagnated. We were on the brink of coming to a complete stop...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In the end, it was you who helped Leones gather up his burdenbeasts, and by using them to carry those goods across Lake Silberneherze, we were able to alleviate that particular crisis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You talk too much, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I assumed that you would have shown more solemnity in light of the ceremony, not take it as an opportunity to babble about old happenings.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: My apologies.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Some things are simply too unexpected in the moment, and so it is hard not to constantly bring them back to the forefront of one's mind, especially during interesting times such as these.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Who would have expected the great Black Knight to be so proficient at riding a burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If you are curious as to why I know how to ride a burdenbeast, then you need only ask.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I learnt it when I was young.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: In Leithanien?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In Leithanien.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If there is ever the opportunity, I could bring the both of you to do some sightseeing.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's not a very exciting place, so don't expect too much.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: How is it, compared to Kjerag?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's not as good.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Kjerag is nowhere near as cold.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: This is the first time I've ever heard you give such an idealistic assessment.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's enough out of you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Alright. We've arrived.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Everyone, please come forward.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: With Kjeragandr as our witness, this ceremony shall soon begin.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Let us pray—
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...It appears that some of our more excitable guests can't wait for their cue.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Just who is causing that clamor there?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: (Gah, I didn't need this pain in my ass right now!)
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Yucatan! Why the hell isn't your wife here yet?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I just got in contact with her, and she says she's nearly here...!
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: What do you mean 'nearly here'?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Listen, you get back in touch with her right now, tell her to go to the moons or something, as far away as possible, just don't come over!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What is going on over here?! What's all this commotion about?!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir! Those Victorians don't look as friendly as they usually do!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I saw that they've got some pretty big weapons of some kind, and they looked real enough to me!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I knew that they were going stab us in the back!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Let them come! It's a good thing I told the Paleroche boys to prepare for this! We meet them in battle!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hold, Sir Arctosz!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But... Saintess!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Saintess! Sir Enciodes!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: The Victorian troops have broken through our guards who were maintaining order, they draw near!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Send out several squads, and prioritize the safety of any commoners about!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, Saintess!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: They have made their move. It appears they have several squads of their own lined up to approach us.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And at their head is that viscount.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What's the plan?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Where are Weiss and Matterhorn?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We haven't received any news from them since last night.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They should have been watching the movements of the Victorian Army very closely, and an operation of this size would have prompted a report by now.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Unless they had no way of sending that report.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Beware Victorians, even as they bear gifts.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Despite my belief that I had managed to establish a strong enough relationship with Viscount Craigavon, it appears that we have not been able to move his heart from its course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is no time to stand around licking your wounds, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They're already far past the point of pretending to be friendly with us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They are professional Victorian troops. Whether using drone arrays to bombard us, or hiding their casters in the crowd, their ruthless efficacy is clear.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is still what they consider 'pressure'. They have not begin to use 'force' just yet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And I assume you have some sort of plan for this?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We cannot allow them to disrupt the ceremony.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Not only will the Vine-Bear Court and the three clans suffer a drastic blow to their reputations, they will lose the trust of the people of Kjerag, alongside the respect of those outside its borders... We would be caught in truly dire straits.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Not exactly the easiest task.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You sound concerned, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We must not allow a true war with Victoria to begin. We need only wait until the next perso... the next distinguished guest arrives.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But at the very least, we cannot allow them to get any closer to the statue of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But they're pretty much here already.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'll go stop them.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Now's not a good time for jokes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: They've got at least two thousand troops out there, how exactly are you going to fight them alone?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It will be easier than me having to handle you after a night out, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Like I said, this really isn't a good time to joke around!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Who do you think, out of the many people that he knows, Enciodes always calls first?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: ...*sigh* You're going to get yourself killed.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If you don't want me to be killed, then you should put in some more work, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Degenbrecher, I'm sure you're already aware of the risks at hand.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I need you to hold them back, at least until we have settled our arrangements here.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: At this time, Karlan Trade, no, 'Kjerag' cannot assist you in the slightest. This is to be the sole work of the Black Knight.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Are you able to do it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Heh. This wouldn't be the first time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You all wait here.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's not good to hold your anger in, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The two of you have talked it over already. I'm not one to make a fuss.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: At least while Degenbrecher holds back those Victorians, I can send out men to find Weiss and Matterhorn, as well as our 'distinguished guests'.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If they arrive a bit sooner than expected, things might just start looking up for us.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'll leave that to you then.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: News of what is happening here will spread fast. I should be bracing myself right about now, so that I can deal with these beasts who saw fit to bare their fangs.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hark, they come.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Halt! Everyone, gather up!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Get back into formation!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldiers

attributes.content: This fog's mighty thick.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Strange, have the Tschäggättä not made their move yet? Why are they just watching from all around the sides?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Sure, our operation might have caught them with their pants down, but surely they're going to put up some resistance, right?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Don't be so quick to dismiss them. The head of the Silverash clan's one wily fellow.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: *sigh* Kjerag can't afford to go to war with Victoria, but us? We can pretty much take a crap atop their holiest of holies. It's a real funny thing, diplomacy.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: The way things are now, I don't think they've got any room to play defense at the moment.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Well, you won't know until you give them a poke.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Let some other men advance for now! If the Saintess and Clan Silverash still don't react, then we continue with our original plan and prepare to bombard the statue of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Wait, it looks like there's movement on their side!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: No, that can't be...
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: They've only got... one person over there?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: It's her. The Black Knight. Of course. It could only be her.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Although I had guessed that this sort of thing might happen...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Seeing the real deal with your own eyes, it's enough to make a man's heart drum with excitement.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A lone woman holding back a thousand soldiers. Wow. This really is right out of one of those knight novels.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You're joking.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: There's no one person who's got the strength to resist a whole army. The Zhayedans can't, the Silverlance Pegasi can't, not even one of the devils' Royal Courts could.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: We've seen this sort of thing before ourselves, Harold.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: I know. Of course I do. 'You might kill us, but you won't kill any more.'
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But do we really have to pay this price to get what we want?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Our army is a machine, consuming an unending amount of fresh meat just so that it can lurch forward once more. Right now, hah, there's just us old boys left.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: We can't bear the cost of it much longer.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You know me, Lisburn.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I've always been a bit of a miser.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And a miser's heart weeps at every coin lost. As long as they keep bubbling up to the top of my mind, I can hardly sleep soundly at night.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: We're soldiers. We've got no choice.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: You're right. It's all for Victoria.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Send the order down, all men, prepare for war!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'll take the lead, and I'll bring along my top brass to meet the legendary Black Knight face to face!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, Harold, I'm not going to stop you now.
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: But I've got to ask, how's it feel having to face down the Black Knight that you like so much in the ring?
attributes.name: Seasoned Soldier

attributes.content: Not great.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Reminds me of one time during my youth, when I was getting teased at one of the Duke's parties. I ended up drinking an entire cup's worth of straight shots at once.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A lot of bitterness, a lot of burning, and a lot of retching.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Enough to make you faint, but I will say that I also feel a bit of... excitement.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Harold Craigavon looked towards Kjerag's endless snowscape.
All about him, frost blanketed the icy surface of Lake Silberneherze, mist gathered in the air, and in the distance, the statue of Kjeragandr loomed, Her face fuzzy and indistinct.

The chill extending all about Her feet made people feel as though they had truly entered the realm of a snow god. The frozen surface of the lake looked as though it was a great shard of rock sugar, covered in icing.
In this unreal, dreamlike environment, these men wearing their valor on their sleeve stood out like a sore thumb, and across from them—
A vague silhouette appeared within the dense fog that laid thick in the air.
Their adversary walked forward, step by step, treading atop the ice and snow towards them. It felt like with every step, she commanded the strength to stop a thousand men in their tracks.
This is as far as you go.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And you will go no further.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: If you wish to watch the ceremony, you may watch from here alongside me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I would be truly honored to have you accompany me, Madam Degenbrecher!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: By all rights, I should accept your kind offer, but...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As a most trusted partner, Her Grace is very concerned about Kjerag's development issues, and has given me orders to approach the base of Kjeragandr, so as to show our good faith.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Concern?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Concern armed to the teeth and carrying cannons is a very rare sight indeed.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Force of circumstance, I do hope you understand.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lately, there has been a most unlawful force at play, wantonly moving prohibited materials about Kjerag under the guise of constructing the statue of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: According to our intelligence, the stronghold of this force happens to be exactly under this holy statue of yours.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: And so, Her Grace was so concerned about this issue that she commissioned me and my men overnight to investigate.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: A likely story.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It is, in the end, Her Grace's intent.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Who could say if there truly is such a dangerous power underneath the feet of Kjeragandr's statue?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But if the Great Saintess and Sir Enciodes were to meet with unfortunate accidents, it would be far too late for regrets by then.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Nobody would like to see something like that happen, am I right, Madam Degenbrecher?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I don't really care what you say.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And naturally, what we do here is none of your business.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The people of Kjerag will handle their own issues. We don't need outsiders to order us about.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm afraid that's that, then. I'm truly sorry it came to this, but this is where I must carry out my duty.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Also, please excuse my curiosity, Madam Degenbrecher, but considering you managed to hold your tongue so well while I jabbered on...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You don't plan on causing delay for us, do you?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You talk far too much.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Haha, well, when you're at my age, it's hard not to be a bit of a windbag.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: But as for you, Madam Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: As I've now learnt, you're not the sort of person to indulge in mindless chatter.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: That's why I hate overly-chatty smartasses.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The woman says no more, slowly unsheathing her long swordbreaker from about her waist.
The scraping of the metal lets out a ear-piercing shriek, ending with the sound of it burying its point into the ice, a sound that induces a trembling in the men that none are able to stymie.
Since they got the intended message, there is not much more need for words.
This manner is more to my tastes.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll say it again.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You will go no further.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: —None may enter.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher
